content: > join the christmas drops-along 2021 1 in the drops workshop group 2 **knitted jumper in drops air piece is knitted top down with round yoke and santa pattern size xs xxl theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see merry santas jumper pattern in man sizes here 3 see merry santas jumper pattern in child size here 4 see merry santas jumper pattern for dog here 5 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-341 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-250-250-250-300-300 g colour 04 medium grey 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 25 raspberry 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 01 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 02 wheat 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 31 black needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles #dropsalong 1 https //www garnstudio com/dropsalong php id=7&cid=19 2 https //www facebook com/groups/dropsworkshop/ 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/224-5-merry-santas 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/41-1-merry-santas 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/228-54-merry-santas
